001package org.jfree.chart;
002
003
004import javax.swing.event.EventListenerList;
005import org.jfree.chart.event.ChartProgressListener;
006import org.jfree.chart.event.ChartProgressEvent;
007import java.io.Serializable;
008
009public class JFreeChartProduct2 implements Serializable, Cloneable {
010        private transient EventListenerList progressListeners;
011
012        public void setProgressListeners(EventListenerList progressListeners) {
013                this.progressListeners = progressListeners;
014        }
015
016        /**
017        * Registers an object for notification of progress events relating to the chart.
018        * @param listener   the object being registered.
019        * @see #removeProgressListener(ChartProgressListener)
020        */
021        public void addProgressListener(ChartProgressListener listener) {
022                this.progressListeners.add(ChartProgressListener.class, listener);
023        }
024
025        /**
026        * Deregisters an object for notification of changes to the chart.
027        * @param listener   the object being deregistered.
028        * @see #addProgressListener(ChartProgressListener)
029        */
030        public void removeProgressListener(ChartProgressListener listener) {
031                this.progressListeners.remove(ChartProgressListener.class, listener);
032        }
033
034        /**
035        * Sends a  {@link ChartProgressEvent}  to all registered listeners.
036        * @param event   information about the event that triggered the notification.
037        */
038        public void notifyListeners(ChartProgressEvent event) {
039                Object[] listeners = this.progressListeners.getListenerList();
040                for (int i = listeners.length - 2; i >= 0; i -= 2) {
041                        if (listeners[i] == ChartProgressListener.class) {
042                                ((ChartProgressListener) listeners[i + 1]).chartProgress(event);
043                        }
044                }
045        }
046
047        public Object clone() throws CloneNotSupportedException {
048                return (JFreeChartProduct2) super.clone();
049        }
050}
